data.name: The Ditzy Demons Are in Love With Me - Opening/Ending Theme Songs
data.detailed_description:
Includes the opening theme and ending theme songs in FLAC, MP3, and WAV formats!

Tracklist

01.Ditzy Rock'n'Roll

02.Merry Merry Go Round
03.Ditzy Rock'n'Roll(Inst.ver)
04.Merry Merry Go Round(Inst.ver)

Ditzy Rock'n'Roll Lyrics

I love you so much, I can't hold myself back

I can't see what's around me with this radical love
But my mind's still that of a maiden
Let's fall in love

Love sniped me the moment we met
Like a bolt of lightning
Striking at my heart
Destiny willed it so

I gave it all I got and lost
What should I do?
These tears about to overflow
Are the best honey trap

It may be selfish but nothing
Feels as strongly as I
This is it, where I set my trap of love

I love you so much, I can't hold myself back
I can't see what's around me with this radical love
I won't let you go, not with these hands
Positive × Positive

I love you so much, I can't hold myself back
These happy days, with this comical love
Let's kiss and kiss 'til the end
Take me to your paradise!

Merry Merry Go Round Lyrics

My heart is always shining quietly

Let's sing of love from here on

The you in me smiles
That's trespassing! But so cute
I can say it now, that from the very start
I've loved you, love at first sight

The merry go round spins at full speed
I love you, love you so much
My full combo of love heats up

Let's sing a love song, ring the bells of romance
You'd better accept all of me as I am, okay?
A crazy overcharging of love
I'm getting chills, my heart short-circuits

My heart is always shining quietly
Let's sing of love from here on

The answer is always shining quietly
